book1.author: Mark Manson
book1.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
book1.description: Argues that individuals should seek to find meaning through what they find to be important and only engage in values that they can control.

book2.author: Robert Greene
book2.title: The 48 Laws of Power
book2.description: How you can get it, what to do to defend yourself against the power of others and, most importantly, how to use it well and keep it.

book3.author: James Clear
book3.title: Atomic Habits
book3.description: Guide to breaking bad behaviors and adopting good ones in four steps, showing you how small, incremental, everyday routines compound into massive, positive change over time.
